thread.title: Quvenzhane Wallis has deal to write children's books
thread.title_full: Quvenzhane Wallis has deal to write children's books

title: Quvenzhane Wallis has deal to write children's books
text: > Entertainment Quvenzhane Wallis has deal to write children's books FILE - In this July 29, 2015 file photo, Quvenzhane Wallis attends the LA Special Screening of "Kahlil Gibran's The Prophet" in Los Angeles. Wallis, known for "Beasts of the Southern Wild," has a deal with Simon & Schuster Books for Young Readers for a chapter book series and a picture book. The publisher said Wednesday, Oct. 7, the series will have three chapter books; the first is scheduled for January 2017. The work is currently untitled. (Photo by John Salangsang/Invision/AP, File)
